fullplot: A series of murders rock a dance academy in New York in which the mysterous directress, Candice, sets out to find the kiler, with a little assistance from a shady male model, named George, who has a hidden agenda for her as does she for him.
plot: The owner of a prestigious New York ballet school teams up with a male model to solve a series of bizarre murders of a few of the students.
title: Murder-Rock: Dancing Death
